description:
You look around and see nothing, the room is too dark to see much,
but you can see that the Walls are gray brick that has moss and water dripping from the old Stones.

description-interactables.name: walls
descriptions: these would make good castle walls you think

description-interactables.name: stones
descriptions:
you see a stone that's shaped like a kidney,
this must be a kidney stone you think

description:
The room is a massive room with Wooden Beams sweeping up into high arched ceilings.
It has bright Chandeliers glowing with hundreds of candles.
The wood looks dark and varnished. It reminds you of viking architecture.

description-interactables.name: chandeliers
description-interactables: They are too bright to look at, so you don't
The metal looks like gold. Too bad you don't have a ladder
